attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: HMS Plymouth needs a berth we have the money to move her but desperatly need a berth. Sign the petion for Goverment help to save her as a memorial for those who fought in the Falklands.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "help save HMS Plymouth."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11802.asp

Prime Minister's Office
